txt.en: Bledu can be found around the Folde Farm, north of Aldburg.\n\nWitgil is going to warn the others about the Orc-threat and has asked for your assistance gathering Bledu.

'I may be committed to my work -- and I would have done it -- but the appearance of those Orcs frightened me.\n\n'I appreciate the assistance. We cannot afford to lose even this small amount of food these days.'
Witgil is at the farm-house on the Folde Farm, north of Aldburg.\n\nYou should deliver the Bledu that you collected to Witgil.
DNT - Gather crops around the farm ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
DNT - Gather crops around the farm ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
You came to the Folde Farm to warn Witgil of the imminent Orc-attack.

'There is still much to do! I cannot just bar myself inside while there is so much work to be done.\n\n'Unless, of course, you could harvest the ripe stalks of Bledu while I warn the others? Together, we may be able to secure the farm.'
